name: WRAITHS Dev
onCreateCommand: bash -lc "set -e; sudo apt-get update; sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends bluez bluez-tools libbluetooth-dev rtl-sdr hackrf gnuradio sox tshark nmap sqlmap masscan && sudo rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*"
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "git submodule update --init --recursive || true; python -m pip install -U pip && pip install fastapi uvicorn[standard] nats-py pydantic pytest || true"
